approach.summary: Add validation in Todo.from_dict to reject negative IDs
approach.description: The issue reports that Todo.from_dict accepts negative IDs which could cause ID collision issues with next_id() logic. The fix adds a simple validation check after converting the ID to an integer, raising a ValueError if the ID is negative.

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Todo.from_dict({'id': -1, 'text': 'test'}) raises ValueError with message about non-negative integer

risks.description: No breaking changes. Only rejects previously invalid input that should have been rejected.
